div.p: There are a few example programs demonstrating the , and messaging that comes with the ActiveMQ distribution.
Up until version 5.8 web demos were included in the default configuration and could be accessed directly using http://localhost:8161/demo url after starting the broker.
From 5.8 onwards, demos are excluded from default configuration. To start a broker with web examples, use activemq-demo.xml configuration file, like
